name: PokeMMO
description: PokeMMO is a free to play graphical updated modded version, of the old Pokémon handheld videogames (Pokémon FireRed, Pokémon Emerald, Pokémon Platinum, Pokémon HeartGold, Pokémon Black, and Pokémon Black 2) and put together in a free to play open world with MMORPG elements added to it.
